column5: Has anyone been to the new LCBO in Thunder Bay on Arthur St. I heard it recently opened, and it is supposed to have a huge selection. Just wondering if anyone can comment on the selections of beer. It seems that in years past when we stopped at LCBO's the beer selection was minimal and we ended up going to the Beer Store.
Yes, I live just down the street from it , there is a huge variety of beers to choose from, Canadian, American, European, etc. it's west of the highway intersection just before Canadian tire store.
